title: 'King' Richard
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: LeBron (not) fighting, 'King Richard', and your #thegamecheatin stories!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones breaks down the “fight” between the Lakers and Pistons, as well as why we don’t see our favorite players “scrapping it out” anymore (1:36). Bo also discusses the film about Venus and Serena Williams’ father “King Richard” (13:18). Plus, he gets to an IYHH including “Every Breath You Take” by The Police as the “perfect” song (23:34), and hears your voicemails from when #thegamecheatin (32:13)!


IYHH Stories

  1. @MaryMeisenzahl shares that fast food prices are on the rise, and there’s no end in sight: https://bit.ly/3nJ0kpa
  2. @manosundaresan shares that “science” thinks “Every Breath You Take” is the “perfect” song: https://n.pr/32qV01m
  3. @julianamkaplan says “childcare deserts” are a secret driver of the labor shortage: https://bit.ly/3DJx07q
